column2: Yuri!!! on Ice: Yuri Plisetsky GPF in Barcelona EX - Welcome to The Madness
A special included with the 6th DVD/BD volume of Yuri!!! on ICE. It focuses on an exhibition routine performed by Yuri Plisetsky.
[['Yamamoto, Sayo', 'Director, Series Composition, Original Creator'], ['Kubo, Mitsurou', 'Original Creator, Original Character Design']]
